title: About the New client
body: Where can i see the items when i not in the game the one i can change the recommend item.??????

replies.body: They removed that feature based on unpopularity, which is a real damn shame.{{champion:32}}
I don't believe that's currently available.  If you have any feedback on that, let the devs know on the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Good luck!
